findings.title: createPair function can be called by anyone
findings.description: The createPair function has no access control and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: setFeeTo function can be called by anyone
findings.description: The setFeeTo function has no access control and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: setFeeToSetter function can be called by anyone
findings.description: The setFeeToSetter function has been identified as being callable by anyone, which may lead to unauthorized modifications.

findings.title: Transfer Function Has No Access Control
findings.description: The _transfer function does not have any access control, allowing unauthorized users to transfer tokens.

findings.title: Approve Function Has No Access Control
findings.description: The _approve function lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to perform actions.

findings.title: transferFrom function has no access control
findings.description: The transferFrom function lacks proper access control mechanisms, potentially allowing unauthorized users to execute the function.

findings.title: increaseAllowance function has no access control
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function lacks proper access control mechanisms, potentially allowing unauthorized users to modify allowances.

findings.title: DecreaseAllowance Function Has No Access Control
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function lacks access control, potentially allowing unauthorized users to manipulate allowance values.

findings.title: Deliver Function Has No Access Control
findings.description: The deliver function lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to interact with it.

findings.title: ExcludeFromReward Function Can Be Called By Anyone
findings.description: The excludeFromReward function has no access control and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: includeInReward function can be called by anyone
findings.description: The includeInReward function has been declared as External and does not have any access modifiers, making it callable by anyone.

findings.title: _transferBothExcluded function is not secure
findings.description: The _transferBothExcluded function has a security vulnerability.

findings.title: ExcludeFromFee Function Can Be Called By Anyone
findings.description: The excludeFromFee function has no access control and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: includeInFee function can be called by anyone
findings.description: The includeInFee function has no access control and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: setTaxFeePercent function can be called by anyone
findings.description: The setTaxFeePercent function has no access control and can be called by any user, potentially leading to unauthorized changes to tax fee percentages.

findings.title: setLiquidityFeePercent function can be called by anyone
findings.description: The setLiquidityFeePercent function lacks access control, allowing anyone to call it and potentially manipulate liquidity fee percentages.
